data.title: Simon Templeman Movies and Shows
data.meta_description: Learn about Simon Templeman on Apple TV. Browse shows and movies that feature Simon Templeman including The Young Unknowns, Silent Cries, and more.
data.text:
Crazy Train

Dede is getting remarried and Manny convinces the family to take the train up to the wedding. Jay could not be more ecstatic that Dede has moved on for good but his overenthusiasm might come back and bite him later. Claire and Mitchell work on their toast while Phil and Cam geek out over their favorite author who is also on the train. Luke and Manny go a little girl crazy, Gloria gets stuck in coach and Alex gets caught up in the romance of the train herself.

Let's Dance

When Officer Semanski appears to be smitten with a violinist whom she is returning to a mental institution, jealousy overcomes Maurice - When Officer Semanski (Diane Delano) appears to be smitten with a violinist (Simon Templeman) whom she is returning to a mental institution, jealousy overcomes Maurice (Barry Corbin)

Styx Feet Under

In an attempt to stop a demon on a murderous rampage upon his human relatives, Paige casts a spell that inadvertently blocks all death, and it's up to the Charmed Ones to make things right, when the Angel of Death wants the mess cleaned up.
